data.name: data
data.description: An array of pagination links, where each object contains a URL and an optional active state.

data.name: align
data.description: Defines the alignment of the pagination. Options are 'start' for left, 'center' for middle, and 'end' for right.

data.name: size
data.description: Controls the size of the pagination buttons. Accepts predefined button size values.

data.name: previousButton
data.description: Defines the text or HTML content for the previous button.

data.name: nextButton
data.description: Defines the text or HTML content for the next button.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Determines the border radius of the pagination buttons.

data.name: animate
data.description: Controls the animation speed of pagination interactions. Options include 'none', 'slower', 'slow', 'normal', 'fast', and 'faster'.

data.name: activeButtonClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes to style the active pagination button.

data.name: buttonClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes to style all pagination buttons.

data.name: flat
data.description: This attribute makes the Pagination border-less to make it flat and minimalist.

data.name: hidePrevious
data.description: This attributes hides the previous button in the Pagination.

data.name: hideNext
data.description: This attributes hides the next button in the Pagination.

data.name: hidePreviousNext
data.description: This attributes hides both previous and next button in the Pagination.

data.name: onPreviousClick
data.description: Triggers on click on the previous button.

data.name: onNextClick
data.description: Triggers on click on the next button.
